author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: Please add compatibility bounds, at least to Julia .

I'm sorry. This is my first try at registering a package..

I am currently trying to add the compatibility bounds and figure out how to work the registrator bot.

This package is pretty much a translation of 
https://arxiv.org/abs/1603.09320
called
`hnsw` short for `Hierarchical Navigable Small World`
The only shortcuts for this that I am aware of are `hnsw` and `HierarchicalNSW`
neither of which conform to the naming conventions...
I am open to suggestions.
You can keep the name if you want.

Your `new package` pull request does not meet the following guidelines for auto-merging:

- Name does not meet all of the following: starts with a capital letter, ASCII alphanumerics only, ends in lowercase
- Name is not at least five characters long
- The following dependencies do not have a compat entry that has an upper bound: Distances, Reexport, julia

Note that the guidelines are only required for the pull request to be merged automatically. However, it is **strongly recommended** to follow them, since otherwise the pull request needs to be manually reviewed and merged by a human.

---
If you want to prevent this pull request from being auto-merged, simply leave a comment. If you want to post a comment without blocking auto-merging, you must include the text `[noblock]` in your comment.
<!-- [noblock] -->
@JonasIsensee can you at least add compatibility bounds? See the third point in the comment above

https://github.com/JuliaNeighbors/HNSW.jl/commit/7fa3aa295166bb43327cae2aa4e9b3ce4e127f5b

I did that but I'm having trouble getting that to reflect here.
You need to retrigger Registrator. Looks like you used the web interface, so just do that again.
Can you just update this PR instead?

https://juliaregistries.github.io/Registrator.jl/v1.0/webui/#Usage-(For-Package-Maintainers)-1

The docs do not tell me how I would update an existing PR.

Also the link for _Click here for usage instructions_ on https://pkg.julialang.org/registrator/select
is giving me a 404 error message.

I tried to fix it but this doesn't seem to work.
Can we close both PRs and start from scratch?

Then I can bump the version number and try this again.
You need to have the same version number, then the old PR would be updated.
Yea, you need to delete the tag.
